module.name: vCorner
module.description: Event-driven corner detection adapting the Harris method
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: The module detects corner events in address events using the adapted Harris method.

param.desc: Specifies the stem name of ports created by the module.
Sets ouput port to use strict protocol.
Number of pixels on the x-axis of the sensor.
Number of pixels on the y-axis of the sensor.
Size of Sobel filter used for the harris detection.
Length of the temporal window in seconds used to accumulate events.
Radius of the spatial window in pixels.
Standard deviation of the Gaussian filter.
Threshold for a confirmed harris corner event detection.
Sets the read function as callback.
Number of threads used for the computation.
Gain of the control delay loop.

input.description: Accepts the address events in the vBottle container

output.description: Outputs corner events in the form of an eventdriven::LabelledAE. The vBottle also contains all events in the vBottle received as input.
Outputs debug information for use with yarpscope.
